label: Description
value: Tulip-shaped candle socket on tall slender stem with pine-cone shape above round plain base.  Socket pierced bronze with green glass blown inside.  Lip flares out, flat with ruffled edge.

value: Stanley Siegel Collection; 1975: acquired by Museum

value: Gift of Stanley Siegel, from the Stanley Siegel Collection

label: Description

label: Physical description
value: Medium: silk Technique: pieced and sewn patchwork of woven fabrics
Theater Design for a Dining Room

label: Description
value: Theater design for a dining room of a lower floor and balcony. Lower floor contains 4 ornate corinthain columns with drapes hanging between them, 2 sculptures on either side, a chandelier and a fireplace. Balcony contains columns with caryatids, hanging drapes, and 5 chandeliers.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and black, brown ink, brush and light brown wash, rose watercolor on white laid paper, mounted on blue-green board with gold ruled lines

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase from Friends of Drawings and Prints Fund
